body:
I thought this was great.  I know it doesn't meet the standard definition of NTR (I'm not hung up on labels) but if you look up at the story codes, it doesn't say NTR. Which means you were only expecting it because of the cucking in the plot. The story codes quite often "tell the story" from a crude perspective. The lewd and sadistic facial expressions of that girl are great. 
I've been cheated on once, sorta sucked cause the guy was like 50-something and my gf and I were like 23. I remember thinking "I hope I'm banging college girls when I'm his age, I guess.." He was buying pounds of my weed so I didn't want to ruin that by punching him. Anyway it was her choice. She was a 90lb twisted beautiful (near) genius- quantum physics was her bitch, nasa contracted her to design circuits.  Also completely nuts. I have a thing for bright crazy girls.. Fuck I miss her.

well i would rather have some good ol' fashioned ntr where the mc feels betrayed rather this kind of weird storyline. the mc is weak af and the fact that he enjoys getting cuckholded is just too unappetizing for my taste

Personally, I really like a good NTR story but this one really isn't, so I hope the author can just go a good old femdom route after this. Mame has a two chapters series titled "Sigma" or "Stigma" or something like that which is similar in that the story features a super nice, beta MC whose girlfriend openly "cheats" on him ("cheats" in English sort of has the meaning that it's hidden, but in this case it's not just blunt but verbally made clear. The clarity here adds to the insult and is part of the fetish), but this series features some really good bondage and corporal punishments, eventually ending in castration, which to a fan of femdm is pretty hot. 
In contrast, the weak femdom here is really lame (no edging with that chastity belt? then why put it there...) and it's also bad as a NTR.
So yeah, this is pretty bad...

This is pretty bad but don't get mad at NTR as a theme altogether (or, if you do, don't use this as the reason). This is bad NTR. The point of NTR is that MC (or really, you) has a good, loving girlfriend who through one way or another you can no longer satisfy sexually. NTR literally means taken by sex.
Here, there is no "taking," because she doesn't love him and probably never did. It's just the story of a guy with an abusive cheating girlfriend. If she loves him but can't help herself, or if she's somehow manipulated by another guy, that would be NTR. This is just plain old femdom and a pretty lame one at that.
Again, I think all sexual fetishes should be allowed and shouldn't be considered as "unworthy of being created." If you don't like it, you can say why you don't like it and how it could be better, but ultimately these doujin producers make the works that best fit their own fetishes, so it really is kinda stupid if you insult them for doing that when you pirate their works...

Why is the boyfriend so fckin weak? I don't mean the girl doing whatever she wants, but at the least when u see ur girl being touched by another man, u gotta punch them right on the face. Worst series ever.
She is not that Hot to be going through.
Lmao he got straight up bullied, cucks should just kill themselves
I don't think we should get made at here. The guy just pisses me off. Like what a fucking beta.
